attributes.action: Make private healthcare company's Pay care workers more than just minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: As we have been through terrible times the past 18 months some care homes have been massively effected by covid 19 and some care company's have not even yet said a thank you to there care workers who have kept the company's going and protected our most vulnerable at this horrific time I think they should be made to pay more than minimum wage
attributes.background: I need them to make it law for private healthcare company's to pay there care workers more than minimum wage

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting pay in private businesses.
